hi we're Oscar we started two years ago

words it's the kind of insurance that we
want for

in the complexities of being highly
regulated and security focused you can
see it gets complicated really fast so
it starts with the first of many choices
do we build our own secured physical
Data Center and manage it or do we go to

managing massive data centers most
recently at Tumblr where our physical
data centers were doing over 20 billion
page views each and every month looking
around that room and seeing that we had
two systems engineers and a handful
developers the choice was simple so we
started looking at what providers should

or Hippa eligible
offerings so for for us we're absolutely
done with physical data
centers there's this misconception
around organizations that owning your

you end up shifting those operational
costs
elsewhere so if you have to staff a 247
operation you now have a networking team
data center technicians and a operations

doesn't seem so cheap let alone all the

you'll be facing
so we chose Amazon and there are many
hippo eligible services that we leverage
that are critical to our day-to-day

such as encrypted S3 with multiactor
authentication this means we have triple
replicated versions in individually
encrypted files the storage is so cheap
that we store every database backup
since our very first member signed up
that's a full database backup every 30
minutes for years with ec2
with encrypted EBS and ipsec we
guarantee that all our data is fully
encrypted in transit and at rest we take
additional measures and remount each
individual Mount point so no matter what
or where any data is written whether
it's an application log or kernel core
dump we're ass that that data is sitting
on encrypted volumes red shift is
critical in organization we use it to
Crunch through hundreds of terabytes of

started with vertica and it worked great
but we had to start scaling that because

shift being able to scale that was
possible just from using my phone
security groups are also essential to us
it assures us that our applications are

now we started building out this

principles that we put in place and our
true today one keep everything simple

use Packer to manage a single Ami when

going to be doing and anible will

application for that specific role what
that means is now a developer can spin

type of role we have 35 or 40 different

taken very simple tools and built a

to keep things
self-service if you any organization
